summary.span: Defines an interface for a page designer component to obtain services from a designer host such as Visual Studio 2005 at design time.

span.span: Defines an interface for a page designer component to obtain services from a designer host such as Visual Studio 2005 at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個介面中的所有方法都是設計主應用程式所實作，並可透過此設計工具元件介面。All methods in this interface are to be implemented by the design host and made available to designer components through this interface. 使用自訂設計工具元件中的方法，請先確認設計主應用程式實際實作的介面。Before attempting to use the methods in a custom designer component, verify that the design host actually implements the interface.
